title: The Dale Brown Interview: Self Defense, Dealing with Hate, Defund The Police & More
description:
Dale Brown has gone viral for the past few months but has been active in his field for over 25 years. He talks to Adam about g*n safety, how to defend yourself legally, helping his community and much more! https://www.instagram.com/detroit_d.u...
https://www.youtube.com/c/DetroitThre...
